attributes.action: Cancel 2021 GCSE and A-Level Exams due to coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Coronavirus has caused disruption to learning leading to many falling behind
attributes.background: Follow the action from the welsh government and cancel A-Level and GCSE exams in 2021 and replace them with classroom assessments

rejection.details: The Government has already cancelled GCSEs and A-level exams this year, and published details of how grades should be awarded: https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/consultation-on-how-gcse-as-and-a-level-grades-should-be-awarded-in-summer-2021
